channel.title: Hi, accountant John here
channel.description:
Hey guys,
Glad to find y'all (thanks to @dev_gar, btw hope the wine event is going well tonight!)
I'm an accountant and have been working on a project to automate bookkeeping for freelancers and small businesses. Check it out! : [EveryBalance](http://www.everybalance.com).
It's entirely built on [bubble](http://bubble.is), again at the recommendation of @dev_gar, and it's been incredible as a non-developer to be able to build a solution from complete scratch in such a short period of time. I'm also not a marketer so I'm looking forward to gleaning what I can from the wisdom here!

item.title: Hi, accountant John here
item.dc:creator: holger
item.description:
Wow, so you are non-developers and at the same time hooking into bank account transactions?
How did you manage to do that? Is that something that bubble offers?

What types of customers/businesses are you targeting with your solution?

Read full topic

item.title: Hi, accountant John here
item.dc:creator: johnb
item.description:
Wow thank you! Working on your end now?

Read full topic

item.title: Hi, accountant John here
item.dc:creator: duncanawoods
item.description:
Hi John,

A couple of the images and videos on the landing page are not loading due to 401 unauthorised.

  • Income.png
  • home video
